dataList.dlg: Bloodfiends are not only vile, they're also very persistent. So~ we should make sure we have everything ready to take them on, right?
Hm? Is it sunrise already? Seems like the hunt is coming to a close.

Yaaawn... I think I'll try to sleep a little.
All the Bloodfiends have crawled into their holes, hiding. I don't need to worry much about ambushes at this hour.
Watch yourself at night. When people aren't looking... That's when Bloodfiends crawl out of their dens in search of our blood.

Not all Bloodfiend Hunters know each other well.
But did you know that we can immediately tell whenever we're out on a job? There's that... unique flavor of leaden wrath and hatred that is found only in Bloodfiend Hunters.

I decided to send the Bloodfiend we captured last time to my home.
The elders back home will love it! I'm sure they'll have many things to ask that Bloodfiend, given the long lifespans of its kind.

Bloodfiends are like wild animals. Sometimes they'll approach you in a friendly manner, sometimes they'll even do something kind. But...
... assume they're full when they're like that. A hungry Bloodfiend will never be that kind toward humans.

Bloodfiends snatch people away from their own families and contort their brains to turn them into one of their own.
Will your real family no longer be your own after you get turned? What even is a real family, I wonder?

Some people consider Bloodfiends humans. Otherwise, why won't the Head go after them, right?
Well, that's their criteria. In our eyes, Bloodfiends aren't humans. They are just vermin we have to exterminate.
Would you like a cup of water?
Ha ha... How does it feel, getting hunted down by your prey?
Are Bloodfiends... making a fuss again?
Don't bother coming along if you don't have what it takes. You'll only step on my foot~
I should wipe that blood off my weapon.
Let's hunt.
Does it hurt?
Agh...
Hahaha!
I'll take... one more of you with me...
This'll be helpful for the hunt!
Oops... my bad.
A few of them gave us the slip, but we won in the end. They must be cowering in fear by now.
I think this area's been cleansed of Bloodfiends. Then... shall we head to our next hunting ground?
Ha ha... we lost, huh? For all that big talk I did... it's a bit embarrassing. But next time, I'll...
